pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, January 15, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Markham, Ontario

1:25 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a Thai Pongal celebration, and will deliver brief remarks. President of the Treasury Board and Minister of Digital Government Jane Philpott will be in attendance.

Bill Hogarth Secondary School
100 Donald Sim Avenue

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media are asked to arrive to the main entrance no later than 11:45 a.m.

St. Catharines, Ontario

7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a town hall Q&A.

Ian D. Beddis Gymnasium
Walker Sports Complex
Brock University
1812 Sir Isaac Brock Way

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media requiring parking for satellite trucks should contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
    • Media parking is located in Lot P, near the Alumni Field.
    • Media requiring advance set-up will have site access as of 5:00 p.m. All media should arrive to the southeast entrance of the Ian D. Beddis Gymnasium, on the west side of the campus, no later than 6:30 p.m.
